Name: Melon Collie Martini
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Crumble a piece of Cadbury's Flake over the cocktail.
Review: Something of a holiday disco drink, but tasty all the same.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2003 by Simon King at MJU, Millenniun Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Melon Collie Martini contains 251 calories
